pages.text: You have succesfully achieved tin and copper ingots, now you want to make things out of it. But you will need a better workbench to do that, which is the Stone Workbench, aka Crafting Table II.
pages.title: Chambers?

pages.text: The recipe shows many possible ingots to use, but you will probably use either tin or copper. To look up recipoes in this workbench, use JEI, because this book is incapable of displaying them properly.

pages.text: This tool will help you craft stuff in it, its a hammer.
